document.full_text: the young right-hander dillon gee was kept in the majors, instead of being sent to class aaa buffalo, because the mets may need him to start this weekend.
document.title: as illness hits, mets keep gee as backup plan
lines_and_colors: the young right-hander dillon gee was kept in the majors, instead of being sent to class aaa buffalo, because the mets may need him to start this weekend.
